tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Amazing experience! The doctor is very cordial in her dealings, handles the patient very carefully and makes sure he/she is comfortable during the whole course of treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Definitely a right place for dental consultancy and treatments. The doctors are very proficient. 
The atmosphere is very comforting and hygienic. 
I felt satisfied with the efforts put up by Dr. Shruti and her team of Doctors in executing my complex treatment. The treatment also included dental implant for my previously done root canals, which complicated the whole thing. But it was handled professionally. I hardly felt any pain during treatment whether done by Dr. Shruti or by Dr. Urvisha, it was definite sign of gentle and crafty hands at work. Also the precise and accurate details of implants were made sure for implants longevity. The experience was definitely better than my previous visits to other dental clinics.
I never had to wait at all during so many visits. Even i was accomodated in every way possible due to my erratic schedule. Thank you for a big smile on my face by Smile Creator.
reply_text:
Big thanks for sharing your review about your dental treatment at our clinic!
We're thrilled you had a good experience. 
We were able to handle the complex situation just because of your understanding nature and faith in our treatment and confidence on our skills sir. 
Thank you sir for giving us soo much time from your busy schedule. 
If you ever need more care, we're here. ðŸ˜Š

review:
I recently visited Dr Shruti Shindeâ€™s dental clinic Smile creator at Andheri for my long pending dental issues and had a wonderful experience. Dr Shruti initially checked my teeth issues and planned the treatment well so that I got confidence to undergo it as I was having fear of injections and intolerance to pain. 
My treatment went well which included teeth extraction, RCT etc. I visited her clinic regularly and completed my treatment. Now I am feeling relieved of my teeth issues due to her excellent treatment. Dr Shruti also explained how to take care of my teeth and gums  to avoid further complications. I would like to strongly recommend Dr Shruti for undergoing dental treatment of any kind.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your kind words and taking the time to share your positive experience! I am thrilled to hear that you're pleased with your full mouth rehabilitation treatment.

review:
Recently I took my Mom to visit Dr. Shrutiâ€™s  dental clinic for Root Canal, and I must say it was an exceptional experience from start to finish.  I was pleasantly surprised by the level of professionalism, care, and comfort provided by Dr. Shruti and her staff.

 Dr Shruti took the time to listen to my mothers concerns and thoroughly explain the treatment options available to me. Her extensive knowledge and ability to communicate complex dental procedures in a simple and understandable manner was truly impressive.

 Her gentle nature reduced any anxiety my mom had, making the entire experience much more pleasant than I anticipated.

The clinic itself was well equipped. The use of digital X-rays and diagnostic tools ensured accurate assessments and precise treatments.

I highly recommend Dr. Shrutiâ€™s Smile Creator  for anyone seeking outstanding dental care in a welcoming and comfortable environment. I am grateful to have found such a wonderful dental clinic.
reply_text: Thank you very much sir. It was a pleasure treating mam.

review: Doctor friendliness of Dr Shruti Shinde is amazing. Everything was explained in detail including estimate for the suggested treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: **** ** ********* ***** *** ********* ** ** ******  Makes patients comfortable and gives complete and correct information about the treatment and  exact time required for the treatment.  Altogether a very nice experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Wisdom tooth extraction was my biggest fear based on previous experience. But with Dr shruti Shinde in no time the extraction was done.
I was amazed with the process and the skills since I was not even aware when my tooth is extracted. 
It was painless.
reply_text: Thank you very much mam for your positive feedback.

review:
Dr. Shruti Shinde is an excellent dentist and a thorough professional. 
She is very detailed and transparent in explaining the problems as also their resolution.
Smile Creator is a very hygienic clinic with all facilities. Thumbs up for the good work!
reply_text: Thank you very much mam. We look forward to the opportunity to provide you with even more exceptional dental treatments in the future.

review:
I visited Dr Shruti Shinde for the first time for cleaning of my teeth and she quickly gave me confidence through her expertise so I could trust her easily and I was glad about my choice.
She is well equipped and her clinic is also done well.
I highly recommend her services
reply_text: Thank you very much mam... It was really a pleasure treating you.

review: I had an exceptional experience at Smile Creator Multispeciality Dental Clinic. Dr. Shruti Shinde was gentle and skilled, ensuring the procedures were virtually painless. The staff was extremely professional and friendly, and the facility was clean and modern. I highly recommend this clinic for anyone in need of dental care. I will definitely be returning for future dental needs.
reply_text: Thank you very much mam, we would love to continue addressing all your dental needs in future as well.
